nodes.text: The 74th Imperial Garrison was a military unit deployed by the Galactic Empire in the Outer Rim Territories. Sometime prior to the Battle of the Gauntlet in 0 ABY, the Garrison was subject to a raid by the Rebel Alliance, which resulted in the theft of several pre-fab buildings.
The 74th Imperial Garrison was mentioned in Onslaught at Arda I, Fantasy Flight Games' 2014 roleplaying game adventure.
